# Welcome!

## Here are the steps to joining:

Create a *free* account in 

1. [**ORCID**](https://orcid.org); use to sign-in to: [**OverLeaf**](https://www.overleaf.com/) and integrations with other [organizations](https://orcid.org/members)

2. [**GitHub**](https://github.com); use to sign-in to [RStudio Cloud](https://posit.cloud)

  - Create a quarto-rendered github-pages profile at repo named '*CHANGETOYOURUSERNAME.github.io*', similar to [mine](https://github.com/JacobKMcPherson/jacobkmcpherson.github.io)

  - Place your research blog posts in the folder '*research/posts*'

  - Message me to join the Github Organization '**mcphersongroup**' for permissions to automatically import your .qmd posts in '*research/posts/*' to the group publications page

3. [**Author.Link**](https://author.link/JacobKMcPherson)

  - Link your *free* research socials: [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/), [ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/), [SCOPUS](https://www.scopus.com/)

4. [**Zotero**](https://www.zotero.org/)

5. [**Biorender**](https://www.biorender.com/) 

Begin reading and writing in our [Favorite Journals](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=%27SEARCH-TERM%27%20AND%20(%221476-4687%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222058-5276%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221740-1534%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1784%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221548-7105%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221533-4406%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-547X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221538-3598%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221097-4172%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221934-6069%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221095-9203%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221537-6591%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-4457%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222666-5247%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221098-6596%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221095-8274%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221946-6242%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221529-2916%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1741%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221759-5053%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221535-2900%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-170X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-9985%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221476-5381%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221476-4679%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221755-4349%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222522-5839%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222522-5812%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221750-2799%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222056-676X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222662-8449%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221521-0081%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221521-0103%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221553-7374%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222470-9468%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221362-4962%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-760X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221471-0064%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221367-4811%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221520-5126%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221549-9626%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221549-960X%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%222662-8457%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-1696%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221546-1718%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221471-0080%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221474-1776%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221473-3099%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221756-1833%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221520-6890%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-3278%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-3251%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221545-4509%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1601%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1210%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1563%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1555%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1539%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1547%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221522-1466%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221531-2267%22%5Bta%5D%20OR%20%221758-0463%22%5Bta%5D))
